programmes.show_description: Laura McGhie with your calls and features through the night. Call 08085 909693 (calls are free from mobiles and landlines). Text 85058 (charged at your standard message rate).
Will Bain gets the latest from the Gorton and Denton by-election and hears about the build-up to the first ever BRIT Awards to be held in Manchester.
Steffan Powell and Rima Ahmed with unique stories from across the UK, explaining details behind the headlines, and the biggest news and sport.
Nicky Campbell takes your calls on the day's talking points, hearing views and experiences from across the UK. Call 08085 909693 (calls are free from mobiles and landlines).
Adrian Chiles gets you set for the weekend with a good-humoured look at the latest news, sport and entertainment. Text 85058 (charged at your standard message rate).
Elis has Barrel of Eggs'ed it. Or more accurately, Isy has. But for a show that holds content on the highest pedestal possible, this can only be seen as a good thing.
Matt Chorley brings you big political guests, the key news of the day, and your views on the issues that matter to you. Text 85058 (charged at your standard message rate).
A round-up of the day's top news and sport with Clare McDonnell and Chris Warburton. Plus interviews with people at the centre of the stories, and regular travel updates.
Darren Fletcher is joined by Michael Brown, Paul Robinson and Nigel Reo-Coker to look ahead to this weekend's Premier League action. Plus updates from Wolves v Aston Villa.
John Murray, Ian Dennis & Ali Bruce-Ball talk football, travel & language. There's news on how to pronounce Taty Castellanos & hear from the voice of the 'corpsing classifieds'.
The day's main news stories, topical debate and interviews. Call 08085 909693 (calls are free from mobiles and landlines). Email: nolan@bbc.co.uk.
Laura McGhie with your calls and features through the night. Call 08085 909693 (calls are free from mobiles and landlines). Text 85058 (charged at your standard message rate).
Discussion, analysis and the latest news from big fight nights and the world of boxing with Steve Bunce.
Aaron Paul, Jobi McAnuff & Tommy Smith discuss the top stories from the EFL. Hear from Kim Hellberg as Middlesbrough drop points again in the Championship title race.
The big news and sports stories, weather, plus previews of the weekend's sport with Eleanor Oldroyd and Jeanette Kwakye. Text: 85058 (charged at your standard message rate).
Join Paddy, his listeners and great guests for the ultimate feel good start to the weekend.
Rick Edwards presents a hilarious look at the world of sport where guests compete with their sporting punditry.
Mark Chapman is joined by Alan Shearer, James McFadden, Rob Green and Statman Dave to build up to today's sporting action. Plus updates of Bournemouth v Sunderland.
Live Premier League commentary of Liverpool v West Ham United with updates from across today's 3pm matches in the Premier League, EFL and the Scottish Premiership.
Reports, results and reaction to the day's big sports stories.
Live football commentary of Leeds United v Manchester City in the Premier League.
Your football calls with Aaron Paul and Chris Sutton. Phone 08085 909693 free from mobiles and landlines. Text 85058 at your standard message rate.
The day's main news stories, topical debate and interviews. Call 08085 909693 (calls are free from mobiles and landlines). Email: nolan@bbc.co.uk.
